metadata.title: CVE-2021-42553 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in stm32_mw_usb_host of STMicroelectronicsin versions before 3.5.1 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code whenthe descriptor contains more endpoints than USBH_MAX_NUM_ENDPOINTS. Thelibrary is typically integrated when using a RTOS such as FreeRTOS on STM32MCUs.

criterions.comment: micropython package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
